message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $150. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $130. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to accept this price?
I'm not willing to go as high as $125, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll offer it to you for $128. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I really want this product, but I'm at my budget limit. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
